solution.title: Share Of Voice DBM
solution.description: Compare a client to 5 or more peers using impressions by region, market area, platform, and creative type.
pitches: Show evidence for market area, platform, or creative focus.
Show evidence for level of performance.
Includes checks to comply with data policy.
instructions: Add a blank sheet URL, this is where your peers will go.
Specify DBM partner and/or advertiser IDs.  This will be your client.
Click run now once, a tab called SOV_DBM_Peers will be added to the trix, with instructions.
Follow the instructions on the sheet, these will be your peer sets.
StarThinker will create two reports in DBM, to change the peer mix you will have to delete these reports and run again.
The error log will tell you if you need more peers or a different peer mix to meet obfuscation criteria
Wait for BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->Share_Of_Voice_DBM to be created or click Run Now.
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Data ( Copy From This ).
Click Edit Connection, and Change to BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->Share_Of_Voice_DBM.
Copy Share Of Voice Sample Report ( Copy From This ).
When prompted choose the new data source you just created.
Or give the dashboard connect intructions to the client.
